front.title: E-VPN Operations, Administration and Maintenance Requirements and Framework

abstract.t: This document specifies the requirements and reference framework for Ethernet VPN (E-VPN) Operations, Administration and Maintenance (OAM). The requirements cover the OAM aspects of E-VPN, PBB-EVPN and TRILL-EVPN. The framework defines the layered OAM model encompassing the E-VPN service layer, network layer and underlying Packet Switched Network (PSN) transport layer.
